source: Web research + public records (Apollo API key not locally available - on Railway)
notes: Decision makers: Property Managers, Community Managers, Regional Managers. Best approach: walk-in with vending proposal + commission offer. Verify contact details before cold outreach.

prospects.address: 2555 N Green Valley Pkwy, Henderson, NV 89014
prospects.notes: Major REIT-managed property. Camden has multiple LV-area properties. Green Valley location = high foot traffic. Decision likely goes through regional manager. Professional management = structured proposal needed.

prospects.address: 4400 S Maryland Pkwy, Las Vegas, NV 89119
prospects.notes: One of the largest complexes in LV area. The Connor Group is a major apartment operator. High unit count = high vending potential. Near UNLV campus = younger demographic, high snack/drink demand.

prospects.address: 68 Inspirada Dr, Henderson, NV 89044
prospects.notes: Class A luxury apartments in Inspirada master-planned community. Toll Brothers brand = upscale residents. Premium vending options (healthy snacks, cold brew, sparkling water) would fit well.

prospects.address: 365 Hughes Center Dr, Las Vegas, NV 89169
prospects.notes: Greystar is the world's largest apartment operator. Hughes Center location = near Strip, professionals. High-end property with fitness center, pool. Vending in common areas/gym would work well.

prospects.address: 12200 Southern Highlands Pkwy, Las Vegas, NV 89141
prospects.notes: Second Greystar property - can leverage relationship from Hughes Center. Southern Highlands is upscale master-planned community. Bundle deal opportunity with other Greystar properties.

prospects.address: 3140 Wigwam Pkwy, Henderson, NV 89074
prospects.notes: Second Toll Brothers property - bundle opportunity. Henderson location in established neighborhood. Near Green Valley Ranch area = stable, family-oriented residents.

prospects.address: 11965 S Las Vegas Blvd, Henderson, NV 89044
prospects.notes: Third Toll Brothers property in Henderson area. Part of Cadence master-planned community. Newer construction = modern common areas ideal for vending. Triple Toll Brothers deal potential.

prospects.address: 500 S Grand Central Pkwy, Las Vegas, NV 89106
prospects.notes: Downtown Las Vegas location. Near World Market Center and arts district. Young professional demographic = high vending demand. Urban setting = grab-and-go demand.

prospects.address: 2901 N Green Valley Pkwy, Henderson, NV 89014
prospects.notes: Established Henderson community on Green Valley Pkwy corridor. Family-oriented complex with pool, playground. Vending near pool/laundry areas would work well.

prospects.address: 7580 W Sahara Ave, Las Vegas, NV 89117
prospects.notes: The Calida Group is a major local Las Vegas apartment operator with multiple properties. Get in with one property = portfolio opportunity. Local operator = faster decision making than REITs.

prospects.address: 1000 Warm Springs Rd, Henderson, NV 89014
prospects.notes: Mark-Taylor manages premium properties. Green Valley is Henderson's most established upscale area. Residents have higher spending power. Premium product mix recommended.

prospects.address: 4750 S Fort Apache Rd, Las Vegas, NV 89147
prospects.notes: Large community in southwest Las Vegas. Mark-Taylor brand = consistent management. Second Mark-Taylor property - bundle deal opportunity. Large pool/amenity area = good vending location.

prospects.address: 11150 Southern Highlands Pkwy, Las Vegas, NV 89141
prospects.notes: Southern Highlands master-planned community. Newer construction. Pinnacle is a regional management company. Upscale area with families and professionals.

prospects.address: 2900 N Walnut Rd, Las Vegas, NV 89115
prospects.notes: East Las Vegas location. Asset Living is one of the largest property management companies in the US. Mid-range pricing = high volume vending potential. Laundry rooms are key vending spots.

prospects.address: 1385 Cadence Crossing Dr, Henderson, NV 89011
prospects.notes: Inside Cadence master-planned community in Henderson. New construction, modern amenities. Growing area with new residents moving in = vending demand. Family-oriented.

prospects.address: 831 S Rampart Blvd, Las Vegas, NV 89145
prospects.notes: Large complex in Summerlin-adjacent area. Fairfield is a major apartment developer/manager. High unit count = strong vending revenue potential. Multiple buildings = multiple machine locations.

prospects.company: Merrill Gardens at Green Valley Ranch
prospects.address: 1935 Paseo Verde Pkwy, Henderson, NV 89012
prospects.notes: SENIOR LIVING CROSSOVER - Active senior community. High foot traffic in common areas. Residents spend most time on-site = consistent vending demand. Easy-access machines important (lower placement, large buttons).

prospects.address: 8600 Scholar Ln, Las Vegas, NV 89128
prospects.notes: SENIOR APARTMENTS - 55+ active adult community. Verified from seniorliving.org listing. Residents on fixed income = competitive pricing matters. High on-site time = steady vending revenue.

prospects.address: 3949 W Alexander Rd, Las Vegas, NV 89032
prospects.notes: SENIOR APARTMENTS - Second Destinations property. Bundle deal with Pueblo location. Verified from seniorliving.org listing. Same management = single negotiation for two locations.

prospects.address: 300 Promenade Blvd, Las Vegas, NV 89107
prospects.notes: SENIOR APARTMENTS - 55+ community. Verified from seniorliving.org listing. Local management = faster decision making. Established community, long-term residents. Community room is ideal vending location.

outreach_strategy.step1: Drive by each property to assess foot traffic, existing vending, common area locations
outreach_strategy.step2: Walk in to leasing office, ask for Property/Community Manager by name
outreach_strategy.step3: Leave behind one-page vending proposal with commission structure
outreach_strategy.step4: Follow up by phone within 48 hours
outreach_strategy.step5: For REIT-managed properties (Camden, Greystar), ask about regional manager approval process
outreach_strategy.pitch_angle: Zero cost to property, monthly commission, modern cashless machines, healthy options
